data.description: Cache the result of http-gets persistently
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Renamed from HTTP::TransparentCache on request from Brian D Foy.

    This module implements an HTTP cache for use with LWP. It should
    work with all existing LWP modules in a completely transparent way
    with no changes to code that only uses LWP, except that you have to
    call one function to initialize the cache.
